channel.title: Anna Gomez on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: “This Is a Dangerous Thing”: Why One FCC Commissioner Is Sounding the Alarm on Paramount’s Deal
item.description: “We cannot allow this perversion of our authority to continue,” Anna M. Gomez told THR.
